MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL65 postcode area of Holyhead, affecting properties in Penrallt Road, Lon St Ffraid and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulty locating the cause of the overhead line fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 09:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:25AM on 31st October 2020
